resource.name: SNOMED_CT
resource.title: SNOMED Clinical Terms
resource.publisher: IHTSDO

contact.name: International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation

resource.description: SNOMED Clinical Terms (SNOMED CT) is a systematically organized computer processable collection of medical terms providing codes, terms, synonyms and definitions used in clinical documentation and reporting.
resource.copyright: This material contains content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright © 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement.

property.description: True if the concept is not considered active - e.g. not a valid concept any more

resource.name: RxNorm
resource.title: RxNorm
resource.publisher: National Library of Medicine
resource.description: RxNorm provides normalized names for clinical drugs and links its names to many of the drug vocabularies commonly used in pharmacy management and drug interaction software
resource.copyright: This material contains content from RxNorm, a standardized nomenclature for clinical drugs produced by the National Library of Medicine.

resource.name: LOINC
resource.title: Logical Observation Identifiers Names and Codes (LOINC)
resource.publisher: Regenstrief Institute, Inc.
resource.description: LOINC provides universal identifiers for laboratory and clinical tests, measurements, and observations.
resource.copyright: This material contains content from LOINC (http://loinc.org). LOINC is copyright © 1995-2025, Regenstrief Institute, Inc. and the Logical Observation Identifiers Names and Codes (LOINC) Committee and is available at no cost under the license at http://loinc.org/license.

resource.name: CPT
resource.title: Current Procedural Terminology (CPT®)
resource.publisher: American Medical Association
resource.description: The Current Procedural Terminology (CPT®) code set is a uniform coding system consisting of descriptive terms and identifying codes that are used primarily to identify medical services and procedures furnished by physicians and other health care professionals.
resource.copyright: This material contains content from CPT, which is copyright © American Medical Association.

resource.name: UCUM
resource.title: Unified Code for Units of Measure (UCUM)
resource.publisher: Regenstrief Institute, Inc.
resource.description: The Unified Code for Units of Measure (UCUM) is a code system intended to include all units of measures being contemporarily used in international science, engineering, and business.
resource.copyright: This material contains content from UCUM, which is copyright © 1999-2025, Regenstrief Institute, Inc. and The UCUM Organization.

resource.name: AdministrativeGender
resource.title: AdministrativeGender
resource.publisher: HL7 (FHIR Project)
resource.description: The gender of a person used for administrative purposes.
resource.copyright: This resource includes content from HL7 FHIR, which is copyright © 2011+ HL7.

resource.name: ISO3166Part1
resource.title: ISO 3166-1 Codes for the representation of names of countries and their subdivisions
resource.publisher: International Organization for Standardization (ISO)
resource.description: ISO 3166-1 defines codes for the names of countries, dependent territories, and special areas of geographical interest for use in data processing and communications.
resource.copyright: This material contains content from ISO 3166, which is copyright © International Organization for Standardization.

resource.name: Ietf3066
resource.title: Tags for the Identification of Languages
resource.publisher: Internet Engineering Task Force (IETF)
resource.description: Identifies the language used in communication. Based on the IETF BCP 47 specification.
resource.copyright: This material contains content from IETF BCP 47.

resource.name: CommonAllergiesVS
resource.title: Common Allergies and Allergens
resource.publisher: Saudi Ministry of Health - FHIR Service
resource.description: A comprehensive value set of common allergies and allergens for use in Saudi healthcare, based on international SNOMED CT codes.
resource.purpose: To provide a standardized set of allergy codes for use in AllergyIntolerance resources in Saudi healthcare systems.
resource.copyright: This material contains content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright © 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement.

concept.definition: Allergy to Penicillin and related antibiotics
Allergy to dairy products including milk, cheese, yogurt
Allergy to citrus fruits including oranges, lemons, limes
Allergy to peanuts and peanut products
Allergy to shellfish including shrimp, crab, lobster
Allergy to chicken eggs and egg products
Allergy to soy and soy products
Allergy to tree nuts including almonds, walnuts, cashews
Allergy to environmental factors like pollen, dust

resource.name: CommonMedicationsVS
resource.title: Common Medications Value Set
resource.publisher: Saudi Ministry of Health - FHIR Service
resource.description: Value set for commonly prescribed medications used in Medication and MedicationRequest resources, based on international RxNorm codes.
resource.purpose: To define the set of codes that can be used for medication prescribing and documentation
resource.copyright: This material contains content from RxNorm, a standardized nomenclature for clinical drugs produced by the National Library of Medicine.

concept.definition: NSAID for pain, inflammation, and fever
Diabetes medication to control blood sugar
ACE inhibitor for high blood pressure
Proton pump inhibitor for acid reflux
Oral anticoagulant for blood clotting prevention

resource.name: CommonLabTestsVS
resource.title: Common Laboratory Tests Value Set
resource.publisher: Saudi Ministry of Health - FHIR Service
resource.description: Value set for laboratory tests used in Observation and DiagnosticReport resources, based on international LOINC codes.
resource.purpose: To define the set of codes that can be used for laboratory test ordering and documentation
resource.copyright: This material contains content from LOINC (http://loinc.org). LOINC is copyright © 1995-2025, Regenstrief Institute, Inc. and the Logical Observation Identifiers Names and Codes (LOINC) Committee and is available at no cost under the license at http://loinc.org/license.

concept.definition: Basic metabolic panel with liver function
TSH, T3, T4 thyroid hormone levels
White blood cell count in blood
Average volume of red blood cells

resource.name: SocialHistoryVS
resource.title: Social History and Lifestyle Factors Value Set
resource.publisher: Saudi Ministry of Health - FHIR Service
resource.description: Value set for social history and lifestyle factors used in Observation resources, based on international SNOMED CT codes.
resource.purpose: To define the set of codes that can be used for documenting social history and lifestyle factors
resource.copyright: This material contains content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright © 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement.

concept.definition: History of exposure to toxic substances
Use of recreational or illicit drugs

concept.display: Finding of tobacco use and exposure

resource.name: RadiologyOrdersVS
resource.title: Radiology Orders and Imaging Studies Value Set
resource.publisher: Saudi Ministry of Health - FHIR Service
resource.description: Value set for radiology orders and imaging studies used in ServiceRequest and DiagnosticReport resources, based on international LOINC codes.
resource.purpose: To define the set of codes that can be used for radiology ordering and imaging documentation
resource.copyright: This material contains content from LOINC (http://loinc.org). LOINC is copyright © 1995-2025, Regenstrief Institute, Inc. and the Logical Observation Identifiers Names and Codes (LOINC) Committee and is available at no cost under the license at http://loinc.org/license.

resource.name: ChronicDiseasesVS
resource.title: Chronic Diseases and Long-term Conditions Value Set
resource.publisher: Saudi Ministry of Health - FHIR Service

resource.name: ProceduresVS

resource.publisher: Saudi Ministry of Health - FHIR Service
resource.description: Value set for medical procedures used in Procedure resources, based on international SNOMED CT codes.
resource.purpose: To define the set of codes that can be used for medical procedure documentation and billing
resource.copyright: This material contains content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright © 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement.

resource.name: ClinicsVS
resource.title: Medical Clinics and Departments Value Set
resource.publisher: Saudi Ministry of Health - FHIR Service
resource.description: Value set for medical clinics and departments used in Organization and Encounter resources, based on international SNOMED CT codes.
resource.purpose: To define the set of codes that can be used for clinic and department identification in healthcare organizations
resource.copyright: This material contains content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright © 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement.

concept.definition: Women's health and reproductive medicine clinic
Children's medicine and pediatric care clinic
Bone, joint, and musculoskeletal surgery clinic
Workplace health and occupational medicine clinic
Mental health and psychological therapy clinic

resource.name: FamilyHistoryVS
resource.title: Family History Conditions Value Set
resource.publisher: Saudi Ministry of Health - FHIR Service
resource.description: Value set for family history conditions used in FamilyMemberHistory resources, based on international SNOMED CT codes.
resource.purpose: To define the set of codes that can be used for documenting family medical history and genetic predispositions
resource.copyright: This material contains content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright © 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement.

concept.definition: Family history of cancer or malignant tumors
Family history of diabetes or blood sugar disorders
Family history of cardiovascular or cardiac conditions
Family history of psychiatric or mental health conditions
Family history of renal or kidney disorders
Family history of bone density disorders
Family history of high blood pressure
Family history of respiratory or asthma conditions
Family history of immune system disorders
Family history of inherited genetic conditions
General family history of medical conditions
Family history of sudden or unexpected death
Family history of drug or alcohol abuse

resource.name: UnitsOfMeasureVS
resource.title: Common Units of Measure Value Set
resource.publisher: Saudi Ministry of Health - FHIR Service

resource.purpose: To define the set of units that can be used for medical measurements and observations

resource.name: AdministrativeGenderVS

resource.copyright: This resource includes content from HL7 FHIR, which is copyright © 2011+ HL7.

resource.name: CountriesVS
resource.title: Countries Value Set
resource.publisher: Saudi Ministry of Health - FHIR Service
resource.description: Value set for country codes used in Address and other location resources, based on ISO 3166 country codes.
resource.purpose: To define the set of country codes that can be used for address and location purposes

resource.name: LanguagesVS
resource.title: Languages Value Set
resource.publisher: Saudi Ministry of Health - FHIR Service

resource.purpose: To define the set of language codes that can be used for communication and documentation purposes
resource.copyright: This material contains content from IETF BCP 47.

concept.definition: Arabic language as used in Saudi Arabia
English language as used in United States
